Class Download_Data

extends Object
    Downloading of AR data with REST services
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).

      • RestCaller

        public static String RestCaller(String url,
                RestClient.RequestMethod rm,
                String[] args,
                int soTimeout,
                int connTimeout)
        RestCaller is for calling REST, that is downloading data.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to call
        rm - Request method (RestClient.GET, RestClient.POST)
        args - Parameters for url in pairs (e.g. {"name","Mike","surname","McDonald"} )
        Returns:
        String of the response of the server in JSON format

      • DownData_LBS_DATA

        public static String DownData_LBS_DATA(String phpurl,
                       String distthres,
                       String userLocation)
        Download LBS xml data
        Parameters:
        phpurl - : the php to call with rest
        distthres: - distance from user position to download entities
        userLocation: - User position [latitude:float],[longitude:float],[altitude:float], e.g. "40.567,22.99,100"
        Returns:
